page.title: Cingular Quarterly Operating Profit Falls
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Mobile service provider Cingular Wireless, which is buying AT T Wireless Services Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=AWE.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">AWE.N</A>, said on Wednesday third-quarter operating profit fell on merger expenses and increasing costs for signing up new customers.
